basic_info.description_header: Innovative software engineer, with a passion for producing cutting-edge and creative projects, bringing your vision live.
basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Esraa Saad. I am a graduate of The German University In Cairo, Software Engineering Major. I have a year of experience in working as a front end developer, dealing with clients and publishing applications, as well as being an IT support assistant and a freelancer. I have completed my Bachelor's Degree in Software Engineering, with my bachelor project being Software Safety in Autonomous Vehicles. In my spare time, I occasionally write and blog, even publishing some of my writings online, but mostly I spend my free time gaming. I enjoy connecting with people and going on any adventure given the chance :)

projects.title: Rescounts Partner App
projects.description: This is the most recent app that I have worked on, deployed on android and ios. It is used with restaurants in Canada as their managing system for orders, reservations and more. Â© Copyright by Rescounts 2021

projects.title: Left 4 Dead Unity Game
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. A small and modified version of the 'Left 4 Dead' PC game. One of the most exciting and different projects I have developed, and the most one I have enjoyed being a gamer and very familiar of the origin game.

projects.title: Software Safety System
projects.description: The aim of this project was to develop a software safety system for autonomous vehicles capable of detecting a problem when it occurs and taking an action to prevent any fatal outcome. Issues that were on detection alert: Vehicle's camera non functionality, weather extremeties and vehicle's other modules faulty data check

projects.title: Car Booking Website
projects.description: Personal project for study subject. My team and I have created a simulating car booking website named 'BookWorm' where services are offered to help the customer choose their perfect car. The services included logging in with an account, browsing cars directory, saving a car configuration to review later or purchase, booking a car and cancelling the booking at any time.

experience.title: Front-End Developer
experience.description: Responsible for creating UI interfaces, implementing functional unit and integration tests and collabration between back-end and front-end using react native framework and Javascript language. Experienced communication with clients to implement their requirements, and was able to succeed in creating them as well as the re-vamp of a published application. Submitted the developed product and is currently available in both Google Play and App Store, and is now widely used in Canada, with a very high client satisfaction and rating.

experience.title: Junior Teaching Assistant
experience.description: Responsible for helping out undergraduates by teaching computer science material and assisting in their understanding of applying their therotical knowledge practically.

experience.title: Intern
experience.description: Trained with various technical and business team members in order to bring a multi-scale project live by conducting Researches and presented it to the specialized team, Working on back-end web development and designed databases and had scrum progress meetings and business team meetings to enhance effective communication and report progress.
